name: bugrelay
description: A modern, scalable bug tracking platform

scripts.setup: npm run setup:frontend && npm run setup:backend && npm run setup:docs
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:docs"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend && npm run build:docs
scripts.build:backend: cd backend && go build -o bin/server main.go
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend && npm run test:docs
scripts.clean: rm -rf frontend/.next frontend/out backend/bin backend/tmp docs/.vitepress/dist docs/.vitepress/cache

author: BugRelay Team
